sentences.en: A Boeing 747 jumbo jet airliner lands at a speed of 160 m / s.
sentences.cn: 一架波音747巨型喷气式班机以160米/秒的速度着陆.

sentences.en: A jumbo hot dog, a submarine sandwich and a sundae for me.
sentences.cn: 我要一份大热狗 、 一份法式三明治,再来一份水果冰淇淋.
一盒特大包装的玉米片

sentences.en: As a personal decision I would never buy jumbo eggs.
sentences.cn: 从我个人来讲,我是不会买超大号鸡蛋的.

sentences.en: Dressed up as Father Christmas and accompanied by a'guard of honour'of six pretty girls, he set off down the main street of the city riding a baby elephant called Jumbo.
sentences.cn: 他扮成圣诞老人,在声个漂亮姑娘组成的 “ 仪仗队”的陪同下骑着一只叫江波的小象,沿着城里的主要街道出发了.

sentences.en: He bought a jumbo packet of washing - power.
sentences.cn: 他买了一包特大型包装的洗衣粉.

sentences.en: He was one of the passengers aboard the new jumbo jet airplane.
sentences.cn: 他是其中一位乘搭这新型珍宝客机的乘客.

sentences.en: I need a jumbo sized donut and an iced tea.
sentences.cn: 我想要一份特大号甜甜圈和冰茶.

sentences.en: It's all full of psychoanalytic mumbo-jumbo.
sentences.cn: 这里面全是精神分析的一派胡言。

sentences.en: Jumbo jets somehow lack the glamour of the transatlantic liner.
sentences.cn: 大型喷气式飞机不像橫渡大西洋的客轮那么引人注目.

sentences.en: The jumbo jet is due to fly the hostages directly back to London.
sentences.cn: 大型喷气式客机将把人质直接送回伦敦。

sentences.en: These are pictures of Jumbo - jet passengers when they stopped over in Paris.
sentences.cn: 这些照片拍的是一些乘坐大型喷气式客机的旅客在巴黎停留等候换机时的情形.

sentences.en: Though Jimmy agreed to go at once, Jumbo refused to move.
sentences.cn: 虽然Jimmy答应马上走开, 可是jumbo却不愿意动.

sentences.en: Though Jummy agreed to go at once, Jumbo refused to move.
sentences.cn: 虽然Jimmy答应 马上走开, 可是Jumbo却不愿意动.

words.tran_cn: 庞然大物；[航]巨型喷气式飞机；体大而笨拙的人或物

trans.tran_en: larger than other things of the same type

trans.tran_cn: 体大而笨拙的人或物，大型喷气式客机，庞然大物
trans.tran_en: A jumbo or a jumbo jet is a very large jet aircraft that can carry several hundred passengers
